<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lunging Spellstrike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2871) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Spellstrike](/Classes.aspx?ID=17), [twisting tree hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=5)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12).

</column>

---

Your spell unwinds the structure of your staff to make it exceptionally long, or even separate it into shards held together by magical power. Make a Spellstrike with a staff, with a spell that isn't a cantrip or focus spell. Increase the staff's reach by 5 feet × the spell's level.
name: Lunging Spellstrike
